There are several modest guest houses.

value: , a few minutes from town, 268 784 4331, 268 779 1074. May have no hot water, but has pleasant rooms. The landlady, Mrs. Deazle, will take orders for dinner and deliver from her restaurant.

, a bit closer on River Road at the edge of town, 268 720 9957, 268 721 2796.  Rooms have air conditioning and small refrigerators.  Coffee and tea service.  The landlord, Lynton Thomas also gives tours and rents cars, and possibly bicycles--ask when you call.  He'll meet you at the airport or the ferry dock. About US$70 single, US$80 double.
